Name: Jose Sain
description:
Jose is 30 years old. He went to school through the sixth grade. He is married and has three children. Only two of them are in school. 

He has been working in security for a private business for 5 years. He is also a farmer, which he learned from his father. This allows him to obtain basic grains to support his family.

He will use the loan specifically to install electrical wiring in his house. To do this, he will buy wires, tubing, an insulated box for connectors and an outlet. Another part of the loan will be used to pay the person who will do the work. 

His dream for the future is to have his house be in perfect condition and to have basic services so he can offer his family a good quality of life.
